text: Maccabi Pardes Katz, (), is an Israeli football club based in Pardes Katz neighborhood of Bnei Brak. ==History== The club was founded in 2012 as an initiative by local person, Roni Itzhak, to revive senior football in Pardes Katz following the closure of Beitar Pardes Katz in 2007.Pardes Katz Presents: All from the Heavens Eli Shmueli, 22 August 2013, DoublePass The club joined Liga Gimel Tel Aviv division, where they played ever since. ==Seasons== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2" width="60"|Season !colspan="9"|League !rowspan="2" width="80"|State Cup !colspan="2"|Top goalscorerGoals in all competitions (Liga Leumit or Liga Al, State Cup, Toto Cup and European) are counted. !rowspan="2" width="180"|Coach |- !Division !width="20"|P !width="20"|W !width="20"|D !width="20"|L !width="20"|F !width="20"|A !width="20"|Pts !Pos !Name !Goals |- !2012–13 | Gimel Tel Aviv div.Maccabi Pardes Katz, 2012–13 season IFA ||30 ||6 ||4 ||20 ||60 ||128 ||22 ||13th ||dnp ||Eyal Zada || 20 || rowspan=4|Shalom Lavi |- !2013–14 | Gimel Tel Aviv div.Maccabi Pardes Katz, 2013–14 season IFA ||30 ||3 ||2 ||25 ||49 ||155 ||11 ||15th ||dnp ||Adi Shamai || 9 |- !2014–15 | Gimel Tel Aviv div.Maccabi Pardes Katz, 2015–16 season IFA ||28 ||2 ||2 ||24 ||53 ||154 ||8 ||14th ||dnp ||Nisim Sabag || 21 |- !2015–16 | Gimel Tel Aviv div.Maccabi Pardes Katz, 2015–16 season IFA ||26 ||7 ||0 ||19 ||36 ||126 ||16 ||12th ||dnp ||Nisim Sabag || 8 |- !colspan=2|Total |114 ||18 ||8 ||88 ||198 ||563 ||colspan=3| ||Nisim Sabag || 31 |} ==External links== *Beitar Pardes Katz The Israel Football Association ==References== Pardes Katz Pardes Katz Category:Association football clubs established in 2012 Category:2012 establishments in Israel Pardes Katz Maccabi
